page.title: 10 Day in the Life of Nicholas
page.content: I wake up at about 7.30 am and then I get dressed and go down stairs for my breakfast. I have a piece of toast and some cereal. Now it is 8.15. I go upstairs, clean my teeth, wash my face and make my bed. At 8.40 I go to school and get there about 8.50. the bell goes at 9.00. We come in and have the registar and some days we have assembly. We do work and have dinner at 12.15. After dinner we have a playtime and come in at 1.30.We do work or sometimes P.E. and at 3.20 we go home.I play with my friend Martin.At6.00 I have my dinner, after that I go to bed.
